## Security Boundaries
Describe the identity, network, and resource boundaries present.

## Incident Propagation
Explain how access expanded beyond the initially compromised instance.

## Boundary Failures
Identify which trust or isolation boundaries failed to contain the incident.

## Blast Radius Explanation
Explain **why the incident affected multiple resources**
instead of remaining isolated.
